title: Mike Wilson: The Highs and Lows of New Bull Markets
description: Equity markets became a bit frothy during early June as optimism over a recovery took hold. So while a correction may be afoot, it isn’t atypical for a young bull market.
itunes:title: Mike Wilson: The Highs and Lows of New Bull Markets
